document_data.mainbody:
Predict weather was a spell used to accurately predict the weather in an area. 
A caster gained total knowledge of impending weather from sky conditions, precipitation, and temperature. The spell was able to predict the weather in an area of 9 square miles (23 square kilometers). The spell predicted the weather at least two hours in advance this time-frame increased based on the casters skill level. 
In addition to verbal and somatic components, the spell required a material component in the form of the druids holy symbol.
The Red Wizards of Thay were known to use this spell before the Time of Troubles of 1358 DR. It was widely believed to have been lost to them afterwards.
